posts.post_title: FS: 3 T206 Piedmont Factory 42 Magee Rucker FLASH SALE 8/31 ONLY $240 EACH
posts.post_content:

Only one example graded through PSA

Asking $240

Magee - Raw - Likely grade 1.5 with multiple creases and some spotting on reverse

Just one example graded through PSA

Asking $240

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/257d0689-5f29-4678-a912-3035f63af11b_zpsfm1ghycb.jpg[/IMG]

Tom C

One day only sale. Will sell both for $470 or $240 each. No further discounts given. Prices include shipping.

Tom C
